fields.title: Identifying number - This field is automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtTranspCost
fields.title: Line 1. Transportation and storage of household goods and personal effects

fields.name: txtTravelLodgeCost
fields.title: Line 2. Travel from your old home to your new home

fields.name: txtTotalExpenses

fields.name: txtTotalAmtTopay

fields.name: txtMovExp
fields.title: Line 5. Moving expense deduction. - This field is automatically calculated for you
